detail_desc: Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Hat in braided paper straw with sequined embroidery and a braided band. Width of brim 2.5 cm.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, jersey-lined hood, short sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, gentle V-neck at the front, long sleeves and a wide elasticated hem.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and stand-up collar with a zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short jacket in a felted weave with contrasting-colour seams, a small stand-up collar and detachable tie belt at the waist. Large patch pockets at the front and no buttons. Unlined.
Short coat in a textured weave with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.

Short, straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with beaded embroidery. Opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs.

Jacket in twill with a slight sheen, collar, and zip and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with decorative gathers underneath and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud and a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in sturdy washed denim with hard-worn details and patches. Tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, small print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight-cut top in sturdy, striped cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut top in sturdy, striped cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut jacket in a sturdy, textured weave with shimmering sequins. Patch pockets, raw edges and no buttons. Unlined.

Imitation suede biker jacket with notch lapels with decorative press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs and a sewn-on, adjustable belt with a metal fastener at the hem. Lined.

Metal earrings with round pendants decorated with large sequins. Length approx. 8 cm.
Long 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with concealed adjustable elastication at the waist and a zip fly and button.
Dress in patterned viscose crêpe with decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Gathered yoke at the back, and a seam with a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Jacket in a cotton weave with a matt coating, collar and decorative gathers around the neckline. Press-studs down the front, long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
T-shirt in a striped cotton weave with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut, striped shirt in cotton and viscose twill in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in a stretch, hole-patterned cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Trousers in a textured weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, jetted back pockets and tapered legs.
Shorter jumper knitted in a cotton blend with some textured-knit sections. Small stand-up collar with a roll edge, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorter jumper knitted in a cotton blend with some textured-knit sections. Small stand-up collar with a roll edge, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dungaree shorts in a soft weave with adjustable straps with frills at the back and an elasticated waist. Narrow elastication at the hems with gathers and a frill.
Shirt in a pima cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, hood with an elasticated drawstring and zip down the front. Side pockets, elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Unlined.

Windproof jacket in a crisp weave with a high stand-up collar, mesh-lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Chest pockets with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets and one inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Coach jacket in a woven nylon blend with press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and a drawstring hem. Striped ribbing at the collar and cuffs.
Striped shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, metal press-studs down the front and short wide sleeves with a decorative grosgrain trim. Straight hem.
Checked jacket in a cotton weave with a solid colour collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in thin viscose twill with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and rounded hem.
Ribbed T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Jumper in marled, double-knitted cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, zip at the top, appliqués on the chest and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut, double-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Coat in a soft, felted wool blend with a brushed finish. Notch lapels, a tie belt at the waist, concealed side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Coat in a soft, felted wool blend with a brushed finish. Notch lapels, a tie belt at the waist, concealed side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details and embroidery. High waist, zip fly and button and straight legs that flare at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front, ribbed cuffs and slits in the sides.
Turtleneck top in sturdy jersey with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit jumper in an airy ramie and viscose blend with a collar, button placket, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with terry inside. Short sleeves with grosgrain trims, and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft, sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length dress in patterned silk satin with a small stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Pleats around the neckline, long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Jacquard-patterned jacket in slub-weave cotton canvas with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, discreet side pockets and buttons at the cuffs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Coat in a checked weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a single back vent. Flap front pockets and one inner pocket with a button. Tape-trimmed inner seams and lining at the top.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length shorts in patterned twill with a regular waist with pleats at the top. Zip fly with a button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a flap and concealed button.
STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jacquard-patterned trousers in slub-weave cotton canvas with a regular waist, zip fly and gently tapering legs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jacquard-patterned trousers in slub-weave cotton canvas with a regular waist, zip fly and gently tapering legs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. V-neck jumper in a textured cotton knit with short raglan sleeves.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut, cotton jersey T-shirt with a neckline in an airy weave and decorative seams.

Trousers in washed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake zipped pockets at the top and a fake welt pocket at the back. Low crotch and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and wide ribbing at the hems.
Short shorts in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and denim shorts. T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey. 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, reinforcement on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
